title: Pages of Fear: Five Stories About the Dead
description: Five Stories. Five Killers. Lots of ghosts.Serial kilers, spirit guides, ghost hunters, shadow people; all show up in the stories of this book to give you a good scare. Each story takes you to a different level of terror, from everyday to paranormal, and the feeling of unease and fright you will feel reading them will stay with you long after you have finished the last page.
author: Lionel T Duncan
